ACCOUNTING if a bill, bank statement, etc. is itemized the things are listed separately usually including details about each one: We asked for an itemized bill, listing all our phone calls and how long they were. The auctioneers must provide an itemized inventory of the items collected and sold. These costs must be fully itemized, including number of hours and cost per hour.
TAX listing all of the amounts on which you do not have to pay tax: In some cases, we recommend making itemized deductions which can reduce your taxable income. The accounting agency trained its counselors to provide itemized tax returns.
